channel.title: Agressive NPC's
channel.description: Does anyone have the code for making NPC's Agressive? Thanks for the help if you post it. Don't post gay posts either please. This isn't for me.

item.title: Agressive NPC's
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Ok in a nutshell

Add this :

for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 5) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } } for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 5) if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } } for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { client person = (client)p; if(p != null && person != null) { if(p != null && person != null) { if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[i].StartKilling = person.playerId; npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; } else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel) if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) { npcs[i].RandomWalk = true; } } } }

under the last bit of your npc speach, in this case

if (npcs[i].npcType == 558) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Initiate/Proselyte Shop"; } }

Read full topic

item.title: Agressive NPC's
item.dc:creator: @xtgscott xtgscott
item.description:
@xtgscott wrote:

Thanks Dark, but I don’t have that first line. Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Agressive NPC's
item.dc:creator: @The_Dark_Abbys The Dark Abbys
item.description:
@The_Dark_Abbys wrote:

Hey ryt here we go,

open your npchandler.java

search for if (person.distanceToPoint

and you should see if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 5)

under it add if (npcs[i].npcType = NPCID) //NPCID = id of npc u wana make agresive

then look down and ull see if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) <= 20 && p.heightLevel == npcs[i].heightLevel)

and else if (person.distanceToPoint(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY) >= 21 || person.heightLevel != npcs[i].heightLevel)

under them add if (npcs[i].npcType == NPCID) //NPCID = id of npc u wana make agresive

so you will now have one npcs id under each 3 of those statements, close ur runserver, save , compile , run and it should be agressive

Best wishes and good luck

Read full topic
